about: Nanocarbon and fluorescent nanomaterials synthesis, characterizations and its applications such as bio imaging, sensing, and drug delivery. Development of novel drug nanocomposite, hydrogel, polymeric micelles, and fabrication of medicated contact lens for ocular disease management.Evaluation of toxicity of the materials biologically through in vitro, ex vivo, and in vivo studies using cells, goat cornea and rabbit models. Molecular biological techniques. Development of elastic biomaterial hybrid patch, and aerogel for wound healing applications. Fabrication of simple paper based detection platform for carcinogenic heavy metals.
